GameCreateCard.title: So you want to organize a Killer game?

actions.headline: Finding ideas for action is not easy. We provide you with a few good examples.
actions.title: Action list for a game of Killer

common.betaWarning: This application is in beta stage. If you find any issue or have any feedback, feel free to reach me:
common.dontShareUrl: Do not share this URL, it contains your private token and gives access to this page.

Unauthorized.title: You do not have access to this page!

faq-for-player.description: You have a question about the game? You will surely find the answer here. If not, don't hesitate to ask the game organizer.

he_guess_my_card.description: You're screwed and you'll probably never be able to carry out your mission... Sorry. - Try to do it differently and get help to achieve your goal.

he_is_not_there.description:
Wait a bit to be sure.
If she is still not there, the organizer will give you her card.
he_is_not_there.summary: ğŸ‘» The player is not here

i_dont_know_target.description:
Work it out, it's the game! ğŸ‘¹
Try to glean information, talk to people and observe.
If you still can't, ask the organizer. But be careful, you might leave clues about your goal...
i_dont_know_target.summary: ğŸ˜ª I don't know the person

i_m_dead.description:
Avoid telling everyone to continue to leave doubt.
Now your goal is to help other people achieve their mission.

thats_impossible.description:
Don't panic, you can take your time to make it.
You can also make plans and work together to achieve your goal.
thats_impossible.summary: ğŸ˜± My mission is too hard

what_are_the_rules.description:
The rules of the game are simple.
Every player needs to accomplish a mission. This one will consist of making another player do something. When this is done, this player will be killed. However, the player must play carefully because he's also the target of another player...
Example:
Suppose there are three players Alice, Bob, and Marc. Alice will have to â€œkillâ€ Bob by accomplishing the mission entrusted to him by the game master. But Alice will also be the "prey" of Marc, who himself will have to thwart Bob's mission. If Alice â€œkillsâ€ Bob, she communicates her mission to Bob after whispering in his ear "You're dead" and asks him for his card.

faq-for-player.title: Frequently Asked Questions for the player

GameStartButton.areYouSure: In order to start the game, each player needs to be aware of their corresponding dashboard link. In case you added them yourself to the game, you need to send them the link.
GameStartButton.confirm: Yes, I want to start the game

help.title: How does the killer game work?
help.headline: The "Killer" is a game in which you will have to be creative and put in place various strategies to try to eliminate one by one the other participants while protecting their own life.

step2.title: We organize the tournament
step2.desc1: After registering them, the application will make them meet each other.
step2.desc2: So in the first example, {player1} needs that {player2} do {action1}
step2.desc3: If he succeeds, {player2} is out of the game and {player1} takes his actions.

step3.title: Let the game begin!
step3.desc1: You communicate the actions to everyone, now the party begins. Every player will try to manipulate each other and hide their actions.
step3.desc2: A few moments later, there is a first kill: {player1} just made {player2} do {action1}.
step3.desc3: So {player2} is now dead (out of the game) and cannot play anymore. {player1} takes his card, now he needs that {player3} do {action2}.

step4.title: Last kill and end of the game
step4.desc1: Finally, our beloved {player1} was killed by {player3} because he did {action3}...
step4.desc2: As there is only one player alive, the game ends. {player3} won the game.

feedback1.content: I had my 30th birthday and wanted a game to let everyone talk to each other. Thanks to the killer, there was a great atmosphere!
feedback1.name: Alexandre

feedback2.content: For my wedding, I wanted an original activity but not too complicated to organize. My guests loved it and still talk about it :)
feedback2.name: Lorene

feedback3.content: In charge of organizing my company seminar, I came across this site by chance. The game was a real success, I think I will use it again for my personal events.
feedback3.name: Elisa

homepage.headline: Are you organizing an event and want everyone to get to know each other? You've come to the right place!

descriptions: I created this application to manage a game of Killer with more than 60 players.
Managing the game is not an easy task! Knowing the state of the game in real time, distributing cards to everyone, managing absentees, and above all, making it fun.
This application allows you to do all that!
HowDoesItWork.seeHelp: See help section to know more

step1.description: We just ask you the actions you want to include in the game (don't panic, we provide you with many).
step1.title: You create your game

step2.description: When a player joins the game, they will choose a name and an avatar (You can also add players yourself). The application will choose an opponent and an action for each player, all players will meet together without being blocked.
step2.title: You ask players to join the game

step3.description: All the participants receive their mission and their secret token in their dashboard. If they are killed, they communicate their secret token to the player.
step3.title: You start the game

step4.description: You have access to a real-time dashboard of the game, you know who is winning and who is losing.
step4.title: And that's it

HowDoesItWork.title: How does it work?

Pricing.description1: I mean, really free! No credit, no account, no card required, no recurring fees, no ads: nothing!
Pricing.description2: I made this app mainly for me, I try to push the idea for the fun.

features.fun: have all the fun you want
features.invitePlayers: invite many people as you want
features.iWillWork: I'll work more on the project

Pricing.title: It's free!

Roadmap.description: I have many ideas for the future of this application. You can send me your ideas.

ideas.customizeGame: Customize the game settings (hide dead players, notifications, etc..)
ideas.pictures: upload a picture of the player instead of the avatar
ideas.places: make game harder with action AND place combination (ex: make him drink a shot in the kitchen)
ideas.slack: integration with messaging Apps (Slack, Discord, etc..)

Roadmap.title: What's next?

PlayerDashboardGameStartedKillCard.presentQrCode: If you get killed, present your QR code to the player, he will scan it to validate the kill. Do not try to scan it yourself, otherwise you'll (stupidly) get killed.
PlayerDashboardGameStartedKillCard.onceDone: Once the action is done, ask him his QR code and scan it to kill him.
